name: Face your fears (sijnstra)
description:
Face Your Fears was developed as part of the PunyJam #2 PunyInform Interactive Fiction competition.

It's a small interactive fiction, built around the Jam theme. For more details on PunyInform and the game jam, check out https://itch.io/jam/punyjam-2

The game revolves around a short adventure exploring a number of phobias, culminating a really bad pun. I hope you enjoy!
